td.content: s:a 31 yr old male oboist presents with mild painless jaundice, severe pruritus, mild dull abdominal pain and Cancer for past 8 days. denies any smoking Patient reports that he never drinks alcohol o:Height 73 in, Weight 116 lbs, Temperature 98.2 F, Pulse 76, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 15 a:Pancreatic Cancer p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to oncology.

s:pt presents with 2 years history of mild nausea. patient also reports increased frequency of moderate fatigue, moderate yellowness in eyes. he is a 31 yo white M. denies any alcohol use he denies ever using cigarettes o:Height 74 in, Weight 119 lbs, Temperature 98.4 F, Pulse 77, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 17 a:Pancreatic Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered CT Abdomen.

These symptoms are present for about 3 days. o:Height 73 in, Weight 115 lbs, Temperature 98.3 F, Pulse 87, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 14 a:Pancreatic Cancer p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed gemcitabine - 1000 mg/m2 IV, and ordered CT Abdomen.
